alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cameron Parish, central Jefferson and southwestern Orange Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of La Belle, or 12 miles southeast of Hamshire, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Bridge City, Central Gardens, La Belle, Port Acres, Southeast Texas Regional Airport and Sea Rim State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
